label.phrase: instead of letting them get agitated hire a sitter to hang out with the kids for an hour or two while you get ready to leave

clusterList.phrase: instead of letting them get agitated hire a sitter to hang out with the kids for an hour or two while you get ready to leave
in general children are fussy and i think it takes a fair bit of socialisation at the table to turn them around
many times their caretakers are not in the household on a daily basis and they may be left alone at times for days upon end
